ibm.1_desc: In the summer of my freshman year, I was an R&D intern at IBM CRL (China Research Lab)
ibm.2_body: Bayesian network, time series analysis, root cause analysis
ibm.2_desc: During the internship, I read dozens of articles on root cause analysis, time series data analysis, clustering, and Bayesian networks.
ibm.3_body: Use Python for modeling, Java for clustering, and Neo4j for data visualization
ibm.3_desc: I designed and implemented an event grouping and reduction algorithm based on Bayesian network.
ibm.4_desc: In the final stage of the internship, I designed an exhibition board to demonstrate my research to the entire laboratory and participate in internal patent review

home.intro_backend: As for back-end development, I have done many event-driven, object-oriented, MVC implementations, and I am familiar with SQL, NoSQL, graph database, real-time databases, and other middlewares such as GraphQL .
home.intro_frontend: I have a wealth of full stack development experience. As for front-end development, I am familiar with all Javascript frameworks for both web and mobile. I am proficient in using transpiling tools such as Webpack and Rollup to bundle applications, and developing portable web components and custom libraries.
home.intro_general: an uprising forth year student pursuing a dual degree in computer science and applied mathematics at the University of California, San Diego.
home.title: Home

icons.css: CSS, and Preprocessing tools such as LESS, SASS
icons.drupal: Drupal 7, 8, 9, other legacy CMSes, Webflow, and eCommerce platforms
icons.linux: Linux, Unix and other operating systems
icons.mysql: Common databases such as MySQL, Postgres, MongoDB, Neo4j, etc.
icons.nginx: Nginx and Apache for single node backend
icons.node: Node and all mainstream middlewares such as Express and Apollo
icons.preact: Preact, Web components, Widgets for server-side rendering
icons.webpack: Webpack, Rollup, Tsdx, and other transpiling tools
icons.yarn: Yarn, NPM and other package managers
